document_data.mainbody:
ile:Nature BG3.png|thumb|right|200px|''Symbol of the nature domain.'']]
The '''Nature domain''' was a set of [[spell]]s that were granted by deities whose portfolio included the natural world, such as [[Silvanus]]. [[Cleric]]s who chose this domain were granted free access to these spellsâ€”they could cast them at any time without having to prepare them in advance.
document_data.Spells: Novice clerics of this domain could cast ''[[animal friendship]]'', ''[[speak with animals]]'', ''[[barkskin]]'', and ''[[spike growth]]''. Those of some experience were able to use the ''[[plant growth]]'', ''[[wind wall]]'', ''[[dominate beast]]'', and ''[[grasping vine]]'' spells. Master clerics of the Nature domain were skilled enough to cast ''[[insect plague]]'' and ''[[tree stride]]''. In addition, they were able to ''[[charm animals and plants]]''.
